statements: SELECT * FROM MarketData
SELECT Symbol, Price FROM MarketData
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE Price > 100
SELECT Symbol, Volume FROM MarketData ORDER BY Volume DESC
SELECT Symbol, LastUpdated FROM MarketData WHERE LastUpdated > '2022-01-01'
SELECT Symbol, Price FROM MarketData WHERE Volume > 100 ORDER BY Price DESC
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE Price BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT Symbol, Volume FROM MarketData WHERE Symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'AMZN')
SELECT MAX(Price) AS HighestPrice FROM MarketData WHERE Volume > 50
SELECT Symbol, Price, Volume, LastUpdated FROM MarketData ORDER BY LastUpdated ASC
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, volume FROM MarketData WHERE volume < 1000 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM InvestmentDecisions WHERE decision = 'BUY';
SELECT symbol, decision, amount FROM InvestmentDecisions WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 100 ORDER BY symbol ASC, price DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM MarketData GROUP BY symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM InvestmentDecisions WHERE amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 AND decision = 'BUY' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT symbol, COUNT(*) AS total_decisions FROM InvestmentDecisions GROUP BY symbol HAVING total_decisions > 5 ORDER BY total_decisions DESC
SELECT symbol, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM InvestmentDecisions GROUP BY symbol ORDER BY avg_amount
SELECT * FROM Market_Snapshot;
SELECT market_id, market_name, market_price FROM Market_Snapshot ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT market_name FROM Market_Snapshot;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Portfolio WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM Investment_Portfolio WHERE total_value > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Market_Snapshot ORDER BY market_name DESC;
SELECT market_name, market_price FROM Market_Snapshot WHERE market_price > 1000;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM Investment_Portfolio WHERE total_value BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type FROM Transaction_Log ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT market_name, market_volume FROM Market_Snapshot WHERE market_volume > 100 ORDER BY market_volume DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE price > 100
SELECT symbol, volume, timestamp FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY volume DESC
SELECT id, symbol, purchase_price FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE purchase_price < 50 ORDER BY purchase_price ASC
SELECT symbol, notes FROM Watchlist WHERE notes IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, headline, source FROM MarketNews WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM MarketData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 1000 AND price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, symbol, purchase_price * quantity AS total_value FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT symbol, notes FROM Watchlist WHERE notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM MarketNews WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY published_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM real_time_price_data
SELECT symbol, price FROM real_time_price_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT symbol, sentiment_score FROM market_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT symbol, quantity FROM investment_portfolio WHERE transaction_type = 'BUY'
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM market_news
SELECT * FROM real_time_price_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM real_time_price_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT symbol, sentiment_score FROM market_sentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM market_news WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND news_content IS NOT NULL;
SELECT symbol, quantity, transaction_type FROM investment_portfolio ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
